Scripts.Name: getVersion.R
Scripts.Description: Provides detailed information about the version of R running. R version 3.4.3 is used.

Scripts.Name: getVersion.R
Scripts.Description: Provides detailed information about the version of R running. R version 3.4.1 is used.

Scripts.Name: getVersion.R
Scripts.Description: getVersion.R script is invoked, but no output is captured.

Scripts.Name: getParams.R
Scripts.Description:
Prints R session command line arguments supplied as GET request parameters.
Call this URL with parameters, for example, as:
http://localhost:5000/params1?num=10&txt=abc

Scripts.Name: getParamsParsed.R
Scripts.Description: Prints R session command line arguments as params1 interface, but parses and converts them to R objects with optparse package.

Scripts.Name: getwd.R
Scripts.Description: Returns an absolute filepath representing the current working directory of the R process. CopyToTemp is False

Scripts.Name: getwd.R
Scripts.Description: Returns an absolute filepath representing the current working directory of the R process. CopyToTemp is True

Scripts.Name: getJson.R
Scripts.Description: Returns first three rows of the mtcars dataframe as JSON-serialized result.

Scripts.Name: getImage.R
Scripts.Description: Returns a PNG image generated by the script.

Scripts.Name: post.R
Scripts.Description:
Reads data, passed as POST request parameters, and returns them back as JSON-serialized result. POST the following data to test the script:
"num": 10
"str": "abcdef"
"dbl": -12.5e+2
"boolean": true
